name: IOService
desc: The base class for managing the setup and registration of your driver.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Handles the basic initialization of the service.

items.name: - Start
items.desc: Starts the current service and associates it with the specified provider.

items.name: - Stop
items.desc: Stops the service associated with the specified provider.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the service.

items.name: - RegisterService
items.desc: Starts the registration process for the service and performs any additional matching.

items.name: - SetName
items.desc: Sets the name of the service in the system's registry.

items.name: - GetRegistryEntryID
items.desc: Returns the registry ID for the current service.

items.name: - CopyProperties
items.desc: Returns the registry properties associated with the current service.

items.name: - SetProperties
items.desc: Sends the dictionary of properties to the current service object.

items.name: - SearchProperty
items.desc: Searches for a property with the specified name in the current service or one of its parent services, and returns the corresponding value.

items.name: - SetDispatchQueue
items.desc: Associates a custom dispatch queue with the service and assigns the specified name to it.

items.name: - CopyDispatchQueue
items.desc: Gets the dispatch queue with the specified name from the current service.

items.name: - SetPowerState
items.desc: Updates the service in response to power-related changes for a provider.

items.name: - ChangePowerState
items.desc: Changes the device's power state to the specified level.

items.name: - NewUserClient
items.desc: Requests the creation of a new user client for the service.

items.name: - Create
items.desc: Requests the creation of a new service object.
